item.title: How do you make a bot using Aws?
item.description: Introduction Let’s go build a bot to inform new releases using Go as language programming, Aws as infraestructure on cloud, Terraform as infraestructure as code. Requirements An account on Aws Go 1.15 or greather installed Terraform 0.13.2 or greather installed Gomock 1.6.0 or greather downloaded Git and Github/GitLab/Bitbucket/Other The follow picture is our work finished Let’s Go!!!! The fisrt we are need define structure to our project, this is :
